name: Vereniging Gasopslag Nederland
goal: Gasopslag Nederland is a representative organisation of gas storage operators and currently represents Eneco Gasspeicher, EnergyStock, Gas Storage Bergermeer, EKB (Etzel-Kavernenbetriebsgesellschaft) and innogy Gas Storage NWE. Since it was established in 2011, we have had consultations with the government, the Netherlands Authority for Consumers and Markets (ACM), Gasunie Transport Services (GTS), relevant European institutions and other interested parties in order to put forward our vision and promote our interests.
euInitiatives: Energy, gas, security of supply, gas storage, power-to-gas, hydrogen and other energy related issues.
